author: johnwilliamc909
title: Stay at London's Saint James Court Hotel
text: Service, accommodations, location and food were all excellent. The hotel helped us make a very memorable vacation. our stay (my wife and I and our son and daughter-in-law) was for 7 nights. We couldn't have asked for anything more!
